metadata.title: Trade Document Data Elements Mapping
metadata.description: Comprehensive mapping of data elements across 36 trade finance and logistics documents

categories.Tr: Transport modes, means and equipments (UNTDED Group 8: 8000-8699)

documents.name: Dangerous Goods Declaration
documents.sender: Supplier, Shipper, Logistic service provider, Consignor
documents.receiver: Buyer, Regulator, Bank, Government agency, Carrier, Customs, Consignee

documents.name: Consignment Security Declaration
documents.receiver: Buyer, Regulator, Bank, Government agency, Carrier, Customs, Consignee

documents.name: Non-preferential Certificate of Origin
documents.sender: Seller, Exporter, Freight Forwarder, Chamber of Commerce

documents.name: Preferential Certificate of Origin
documents.sender: Seller, Exporter, Freight Forwarder, Chamber of Commerce

documents.name: Certificate of Inspection for Organic Products
Administrative Documents used in the Excise Movement Control System

references.name: Document Identifier
references.description: Reference number identifying a specific document

references.name: Booking reference number
references.description: Reference number assigned by a carrier or its agent to identify a specific consignment

references.name: Purchase Order number
references.description: Identifier assigned by the buyer to an order

references.name: House waybill document identifier
references.description: Reference number to identify a house waybill

references.name: Customs Declaration Document, Trader Assigned
references.description: Reference assigned by a trader to identify a declaration

references.name: Dangerous Goods Declaration identifier
references.description: Reference number to identify a Dangerous Goods Declaration

references.name: Documentary credit identifier
references.description: Reference number to identify a documentary credit

references.name: Transport Contract Document / Bill of Lading number
references.description: Reference number to identify a document evidencing a transport contract

references.name: Unique Consignment Reference (UCR)
references.description: Unique reference identifying a particular consignment of goods

references.name: Contract number
references.description: Identifier of a contract concluded between parties

references.name: Invoice number
references.description: Reference number to identify an invoice

references.name: Goods declaration number
references.description: Reference number, assigned or accepted by Customs, to identify a goods declaration

references.name: Freight Forwarder reference number
references.description: Reference number assigned by the freight forwarder to identify a particular consignment

references.name: Goods Item sequence identifier
references.description: Sequence number differentiating a specific goods item within a consignment

references.name: EORI number
references.description: Economic Operators Registration and Identification number for EU import/export businesses

references.name: Approval number
references.description: Approval number of establishments (slaughterhouse, production plant, store)

references.name: Certificate of origin number
references.description: Reference number to identify a certificate of origin

references.name: Insurance policy number
references.description: Reference number to identify an insurance policy

references.name: Permit/Certificate/Carnet number
references.description: Unique number allocated to each document by the relevant Issuing Authority

dates.name: Issue date
dates.description: Date that a document was issued and when appropriate, signed or otherwise authenticated

dates.name: Actual arrival date
dates.description: Date and/or time of the arrival of means of transport

dates.name: Latest pick-up date
dates.description: Latest date and optionally time when a consignment of goods can been picked-up by a carrier

dates.name: Delivery date
dates.description: Date and optionally time by which the merchandise should be delivered to the buyer

dates.name: Despatch date
dates.description: Date and optionally time on which goods are, or are expected to be despatched or consigned

dates.name: Estimated time of departure
dates.description: Date and/or time when a transport means is scheduled to depart

dates.name: Documentary credit document effective end date
dates.description: Date on which the validity of a documentary credit expires

dates.name: Documentary credit document issue date
dates.description: Issue date of a documentary credit

dates.name: Actual departure date
dates.description: Date and/or time of the departure of means of transport

dates.name: Consignment loading date
dates.description: Date and optionally time when a consignment is to be or has been loaded onto a means of transport

dates.name: Estimated time of arrival
dates.description: Date and/or time of the estimated arrival of means of transport

dates.name: Invoice date
dates.description: Date of issue of an invoice

dates.name: Payment due date
dates.description: Date when an amount due should be made available to the creditor under the terms of payment

dates.name: Permit/Certificate/Carnet expiry date
dates.description: Date on which the validity of a Permit/Certificate or Carnet expires

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Buyer
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party to which merchandise or services are sold

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Warehouse depositor
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party depositing goods in a warehouse

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Invoicee
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party to whom an invoice is issued

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Seller's bank
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Bank designated by the seller to receive payment

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Importer
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party who makes - or on whose behalf - an import declaration

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Warehouse keeper
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party taking responsibility for goods entered into a warehouse

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Exporter
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party who makes, or on whose behalf the export declaration is made

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Consignment route
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Route to be used for the transport of goods

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Customs office of destination
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Customs office at which goods are released from a Customs transit regime

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Customs office of entry
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Customs office at which the goods enter the customs territory of destination

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Customs office of transit
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Customs office which is responsible for transit formalities en route

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Carrier (Transport Services Provider)
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party providing the transport of goods between named points

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Consignee
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party to which goods are consigned

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Insured party
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party which benefits from insurance coverage

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Ship to / Delivery Party
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party to which goods should be delivered, if not identical with consignee

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Warehouse
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Warehouse where a particular consignment has been stored

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Freight Forwarder
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party undertaking forwarding of goods

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Transport equipment operator
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party owning, operating or controlling the transport equipment

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Notify party
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party to be notified

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Agent
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Authorized representative

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Documentary Credit Applicant
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Name and address of the applicant of a documentary credit

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Documentary Credit Applicant Agent Bank
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Bank acting on behalf of the applicant of a documentary credit

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Documentary Credit Available Bank
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Bank at which the Documentary credit is available

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Documentary Credit Beneficiary
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Name and address of the beneficiary of a documentary credit

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Despatch/Pick-up Party
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party where goods are to be, or have been, taken over by a carrier

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Documentary Credit Drawee
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party on whom any draft is to be drawn from the documentary credit

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Consignor
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party consigning goods as stipulated in the transport contract

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Seller
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party selling merchandise or services to a buyer

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Documentary Credit Reimbursing Bank
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Bank nominated by the issuing bank to reimburse

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Payee
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party to which a payment is to be or has been made

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Buyer's bank
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Bank employed by the buyer to make a payment

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Freight payer
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Party responsible for the payment of freight charges

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Seller's bank account number
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Identifier of an account with the bank designated to receive payment

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Insurance company
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Details related to the company engaged in the business of insurance

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Issuer / Drawer
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: The entity or person who issues the bill of exchange

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Permit/Certificate/Carnet issuer
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Name, signature and seal of the party issuing the Permit/Certificate/Carnet

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Management/Competent Authority
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Name, address, national seal/stamp and country of Management/Competent Authority

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Advance ruling applicant
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Importer, exporter, producer or person applying for an advance ruling

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Advance ruling application recipient
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Customs administration responsible for the issuance of advance rulings

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Drawee
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: The entity or person who is obligated to make the payment specified in the bill of exchange

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Guarantor
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Financial institution, insurance company, or approved entity acting as the guarantor

parties_addresses_places_countries.name: Excise guarantee beneficiary
parties_addresses_places_countries.description: Revenue authority responsible for collecting the excise duties

locations.name: Place of the delivery of the goods (by the carrier)
locations.description: Location to which a consignment is to be delivered to the final consignee

locations.name: Destination country
locations.description: Country to which a consignment of goods is to be or has been delivered

locations.name: Emergency Contact
locations.description: The name of the person to be contacted in the event of a dangerous goods emergency

locations.name: Consignment. Exit Customs Office
locations.description: Customs office at which the goods leave the customs territory of despatch

locations.name: Original Loading Location
locations.description: Location where the goods were first loaded onto the means of transport

locations.name: Payment Location
locations.description: Name of the place where the payment has been, or should be made

locations.name: Customs office of guarantee
locations.description: Customs office at which a security or guarantee is lodged

locations.name: Despatch
locations.description: Place, from or at which despatch is to take place

locations.name: Account holder
locations.description: Holder of an account

locations.name: Place or departure
locations.description: Port, airport or other type of location from which a means of transport departs

locations.name: Consignment destination country
locations.description: Name of the country to which the goods are to be delivered

locations.name: Exportation country
locations.description: Country from which a consignment of goods was initially exported

locations.name: Origin country
locations.description: Country in which the goods have been produced or manufactured

locations.name: Arrival location
locations.description: Port, airport or other type of location at which a means of transport arrives

locations.name: Place of taking over of the goods (by the carrier from the consignor or his agent)
locations.description: Place where the goods are taken over by the carrier

locations.name: Baseport Unloading Location
locations.description: The place or port at which the cargo is discharged or unloaded

locations.name: Insurance claim adjuster
locations.description: Name and address of the insurance claims adjuster

locations.name: Name of the destination station
locations.description: Place at which goods are unloaded from the means of transport

locations.name: Place of issue
locations.description: Location where a document was issued and when appropriate, signed

locations.name: Specimen country of re-export
locations.description: Country from which the specimens were re-exported

locations.name: Specimen country of origin
locations.description: Country in which the specimens were taken from the wild

locations.name: Transit location
locations.description: A transit event for this logistics transport movement

clauses_conditions_instructions.name: Transport Contract Document Conditions
clauses_conditions_instructions.description: Reference to carrier's conditions of carriage

clauses_conditions_instructions.name: Handling Instructions
clauses_conditions_instructions.description: Free form description of a set of handling instructions

clauses_conditions_instructions.name: Loading Instructions
clauses_conditions_instructions.description: Instructions on where or how specified packages or containers are to be loaded

clauses_conditions_instructions.name: Insurance condition
clauses_conditions_instructions.description: Reference to the general conditions of insurance

clauses_conditions_instructions.name: Certification
clauses_conditions_instructions.description: Text of official certification, legalisation or stamp

clauses_conditions_instructions.name: Nature of transaction
clauses_conditions_instructions.description: Textual representation of a type of contract

clauses_conditions_instructions.name: Authentication
clauses_conditions_instructions.description: Proof that a document has been authenticated

clauses_conditions_instructions.name: Delivery Instructions
clauses_conditions_instructions.description: Delivery instructions relating to a consignment

clauses_conditions_instructions.name: CITES Appendix reference
clauses_conditions_instructions.description: Number of the Appendix of the CITES Convention

clauses_conditions_instructions.name: Security information
clauses_conditions_instructions.description: A note of security information related to a consignment

clauses_conditions_instructions.name: Conditions of guarantee
clauses_conditions_instructions.description: Circumstances under which the excise guarantee becomes payable

terms.name: Trade terms conditions description
terms.description: Free form description of delivery or transport terms (Incoterms)

terms.name: Trade terms conditions code
terms.description: Code specifying the delivery or transport terms (Incoterms)

terms.name: Payment term
terms.description: Identification of the terms of payment between the parties

terms.name: Type of transit guarantee
terms.description: Details regarding undertaking given to ensure obligation is fulfilled

terms.name: Document endorsement
terms.description: Proof that a document has been signed

terms.name: Payment Method
terms.description: Code specifying a method of payment

terms.name: Purpose of CITES trade transaction
terms.description: Purpose codes: commercial, zoo, botanical garden, scientific, etc.

amounts_charges_percentages.name: Insured value amount
amounts_charges_percentages.description: Total sum covered by an insurance

amounts_charges_percentages.name: Goods value
amounts_charges_percentages.description: Value of the goods for the calculation of freight charges

amounts_charges_percentages.name: Tax or fee type
amounts_charges_percentages.description: Type of duty or tax applicable

amounts_charges_percentages.name: Allowance / Charge
amounts_charges_percentages.description: Code specifying a type of an adjustment to a monetary amount

amounts_charges_percentages.name: Tax or fee assessment basis amount
amounts_charges_percentages.description: The amount on which a duty or tax or fee will be assessed

amounts_charges_percentages.name: Freight and charges amount
amounts_charges_percentages.description: Costs incurred by the shipper in moving goods

amounts_charges_percentages.name: Prepaid amount
amounts_charges_percentages.description: Monetary amount of charges paid in advance

amounts_charges_percentages.name: Total collect charges
amounts_charges_percentages.description: Charges to be collected from the consignee

amounts_charges_percentages.name: Total invoice amount
amounts_charges_percentages.description: Total monetary amount charged in one or more invoices

amounts_charges_percentages.name: Insurance amount
amounts_charges_percentages.description: Amount of premium payable to the insurance company

amounts_charges_percentages.name: Tax amount
amounts_charges_percentages.description: Amount resulting from value added tax

amounts_charges_percentages.name: Excise duty amount
amounts_charges_percentages.description: Maximum financial liability undertaken by the guarantor

amounts_charges_percentages.name: Type of excise duty
amounts_charges_percentages.description: The specific excise duty applicable to the goods

measure_quantities.name: Humidity percentage
measure_quantities.description: The measurement of the moisture in the air

measure_quantities.name: Gross weight
measure_quantities.description: Total gross weight of all goods items

measure_quantities.name: Net weight
measure_quantities.description: Total net weight of all goods items

measure_quantities.name: Quantity ordered
measure_quantities.description: The quantity which has been ordered

measure_quantities.name: Customs Tariff Quantity Deduction
measure_quantities.description: Quantity to be deducted from the tariff quantity

measure_quantities.name: Package length
measure_quantities.description: Measure of the length of a package

measure_quantities.name: Package width
measure_quantities.description: Measure of the width of a package

measure_quantities.name: Transport Temperature
measure_quantities.description: Instructions regarding the temperature for cargo transport

measure_quantities.name: Transport Means, gross weight
measure_quantities.description: The measure of the overall size of a vessel

measure_quantities.name: Volume (Cube)
measure_quantities.description: Measurement arrived at by multiplying length, width and height

measure_quantities.name: Annual quota
measure_quantities.description: Current annual quota for the CITES species concerned

measure_quantities.name: Exported quantity
measure_quantities.description: Total number of CITES specimens exported in the current calendar year

goods.name: Description of Goods
goods.description: Plain language description of the nature of a goods item

goods.name: Consignment summary description
goods.description: Plain language description of a consignment in summary terms

goods.name: Number of Packages
goods.description: Number of packages per goods item

goods.name: Type of Packaging (UNCEFACT coded) and shipping marks
goods.description: Code specifying the type of packaging of an item

goods.name: Shipping Marks
goods.description: Free form description of the marks and numbers on a transport unit

goods.name: Risk object text
goods.description: Free form description of the object sub-type of a risk

goods.name: HS Code (Commodity Code)
goods.description: Code specifying a type of goods for Customs, transport or statistical purposes

goods.name: Name of animal or plant
goods.description: Scientific name (genus and species) of the animal or plant

goods.name: Specimen description
goods.description: Description of the specimens entering trade

dangerous_goods.name: Flashpoint temperature
dangerous_goods.description: The value of the flashpoint of dangerous goods

dangerous_goods.name: UNDG Number
dangerous_goods.description: United Nations Dangerous Goods Identifier

dangerous_goods.name: Dangerous Goods Technical Name
dangerous_goods.description: Proper shipping name, supplemented with technical name

dangerous_goods.name: Upper Orange Hazard Placard ID
dangerous_goods.description: Identity number for the upper part of the orange hazard placard

dangerous_goods.name: Lower Orange Hazard Placard ID
dangerous_goods.description: Identity number for the lower part of the orange hazard placard

dangerous_goods.name: Dangerous Goods Regulation Code
dangerous_goods.description: Code specifying a dangerous goods regulation

dangerous_goods.name: Packaging. Danger Level.Code
dangerous_goods.description: Code specifying the level of danger for packaging

dangerous_goods.name: Dangerous goods class number
dangerous_goods.description: Identification of a hazard class applicable to dangerous goods

dangerous_goods.name: Explosive Compatibility Group Code
dangerous_goods.description: Code specifying the explosive compatibility group

dangerous_goods.name: Reportable Quantity
dangerous_goods.description: The reportable quantity for transported dangerous goods

dangerous_goods.name: Tunnel Restriction Code
dangerous_goods.description: Code specifying the tunnel restriction for dangerous goods

dangerous_goods.name: Special Provision ID
dangerous_goods.description: Unique identifier of the special provision for dangerous goods

dangerous_goods.name: All Packed In One Information
dangerous_goods.description: All packed in one information for transported dangerous goods

dangerous_goods.name: Q-Value Number
dangerous_goods.description: The number of the Q-Value for transported dangerous goods

dangerous_goods.name: Overpack Information
dangerous_goods.description: Overpack information for transported dangerous goods

dangerous_goods.name: Aircraft Limitation Information (PAX & CGO or CAO)
dangerous_goods.description: Aircraft limitation information for dangerous goods

dangerous_goods.name: Shipper DG Declaration Information
dangerous_goods.description: Shipper declaration information for dangerous goods

dangerous_goods.name: Radioactive Indicator
dangerous_goods.description: Indicator of whether transported dangerous goods are radioactive

dangerous_goods.name: Radioactive Material Details
dangerous_goods.description: The radioactive material (Class 7) transported as dangerous goods

dangerous_goods.name: Dangerous Goods Logistics Package
dangerous_goods.description: A logistics package specified for transported dangerous goods

transport_modes_means_equipments.name: Conveyance reference number/Journey identifier
transport_modes_means_equipments.description: Identifier of a journey of a means of transport

transport_modes_means_equipments.name: Mode of Transport
transport_modes_means_equipments.description: Code specifying a mode of transport

transport_modes_means_equipments.name: Container size and type
transport_modes_means_equipments.description: Code specifying the characteristics of a piece of transport equipment

transport_modes_means_equipments.name: Full or empty container
transport_modes_means_equipments.description: Code specifying how full a piece of transport equipment is

transport_modes_means_equipments.name: Transport Means Type Code
transport_modes_means_equipments.description: Code specifying the type of logistics means of transport

transport_modes_means_equipments.name: Transport means identifier
transport_modes_means_equipments.description: Name of a specific means of transport such as the vessel name

transport_modes_means_equipments.name: Vehicle registration number
transport_modes_means_equipments.description: Identifier of a specific means of transport

transport_modes_means_equipments.name: Transport Equipment Identifier
transport_modes_means_equipments.description: Identifier of a piece of transport equipment

transport_modes_means_equipments.name: Transport means at border crossing
transport_modes_means_equipments.description: Identifier of the means of transport used in crossing the border

others.name: Tax Regime Type
others.description: Code specifying a regime according to which tax is assessed

others.name: Seal Identifier
others.description: The identification number of a seal affixed to transport equipment
